menu.name: Hamburger
menu.description: A delicious beef hamburger, served with fresh vegetables and a special house sauce.

menu.name: Caesar Salad
menu.description: A fresh Caesar salad with crispy croutons, Parmesan cheese, and a creamy Caesar dressing.

menu.name: Grilled Salmon
menu.description: Perfectly grilled salmon fillet, served with a side of roasted vegetables and lemon butter sauce.

menu.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
menu.description: Warm chocolate cake with a molten center, served with vanilla ice cream.

menu.name: Avocado Toast
menu.description: Fresh avocado spread on toasted sourdough, topped with poached egg and cherry tomatoes.

menu.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
menu.description: Golden grilled bread filled with melted gouda and cheddar cheese, served with a side of tomato soup.

menu.name: Ribeye Steak
menu.description: Juicy ribeye steak cooked to perfection, served with mashed potatoes and peppercorn sauce.

menu.name: Tiramisu
menu.description: Classic Italian tiramisu layered with mascarpone cream and espresso-soaked ladyfingers.

menu.name: Margherita Pizza
menu.description: Classic pizza with tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese, and fresh basil.

menu.name: Bruschetta
menu.description: Toasted bread topped with diced tomatoes, garlic, olive oil, and fresh basil.

menu.name: Spaghetti Carbonara
menu.description: Traditional pasta with crispy pancetta, egg yolk, Parmesan cheese, and black pepper.

menu.name: Panna Cotta
menu.description: Creamy panna cotta served with a raspberry coulis.

menu.name: Fish & Chips
menu.description: Crispy battered fish served with golden fries and tartar sauce.

menu.name: Seafood Platter
menu.description: A variety of grilled seafood, including shrimp, calamari, and mussels, served with garlic butter.

menu.name: Greek Salad
menu.description: A refreshing mix of cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, feta cheese, and olive oil.

menu.name: Key Lime Pie
menu.description: Tangy key lime pie with a buttery graham cracker crust and whipped cream topping.
